Key Match Events: Aaron Judge is a significant threat with 51 home runs and 123 RBIs this season, looking to break his own home run record.
Masyn Winn has been fantastic this season, leading the Cardinals in hits and setting up their offense effectively.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cardinals are clinging to life, trailing the final wildcard spot by six games and needing to start winning now.
The Yankees are the best team in the American League, pushing for the top seed and home-field advantage in the playoffs.
